statements.sql: select * from "users" where "id" = '1' and "users"."deleted_at" is null limit 1

params.hints:
Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
LIMIT without ORDER BY causes non-deterministic results, depending on the query execution plan

statements.sql: select "matches".*, "match_user"."user_id" as "pivot_user_id", "match_user"."match_id" as "pivot_match_id", "match_user"."created_at" as "pivot_created_at", "match_user"."updated_at" as "pivot_updated_at", "match_user"."score" as "pivot_score" from "matches" inner join "match_user" on "matches"."id" = "match_user"."match_id" where "match_user"."user_id" in ('1') order by "created_at" desc

select "users".*, "match_user"."match_id" as "pivot_match_id", "match_user"."user_id" as "pivot_user_id", "match_user"."created_at" as "pivot_created_at", "match_user"."updated_at" as "pivot_updated_at", "match_user"."score" as "pivot_score" from "users" inner join "match_user" on "users"."id" = "match_user"."user_id" where "match_user"."match_id" in ('9', '8', '7') and "users"."deleted_at" is null order by "pivot_score" desc
